title: Refusal of refund value payment for a deposit
context: ยง342G-116 Refusal of refund value payment for a deposit beverage container. Redemption centers shall refuse to pay the refund value on any broken, corroded, or dismembered deposit beverage container, or any deposit beverage container that: (1) Contains a free-flowing liquid; (2) Does not properly indicate a refund value; (3) Contains a significant amount of foreign material; or (4) Exhibits characteristics of having been previously processed and baled. [L 2002, c 176, pt of ยง2; am L 2005, c 206, ยง5; am L 2007, c 285, ยง9]
